commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (And so, the day of the event is finally here. Everyone is extremely nervous.)

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Ahhh, it's almost our turn.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rina-chan Board says, "Pit-a-pat."

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Would you two like some hot barley tea? Having something warm in your stomach will help you relax.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: My grandma gave me some candied sweet potato to share with everyone. Want some?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oh, I want some!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I-It's good to get some carbs in your system before exercising, right? Maybe I'll have some, too.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Kasumi, sweet potatoes can be tough to digest.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Huh?! Oh, I knew that!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Kasumi is so nervous.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Oh? Karin, I think your shoes are on the wrong feet.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: What?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Everyone is on edge because this is their first event. It's only natural. They're about to go on in front of so many people.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Let's gather around for a pep talk before you go out there!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Awesome idea! Let's do it!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: S-Sure. Why not?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Groan* This makes me even more nervous.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ready, everyone?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You've been practicing so hard, Kasumi. All that practice has made you even cuter!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Of course it has! I'm the cutest idol!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shizuku, it's time to show off everything you've learned in drama club. I know you'll be able to give the performance you've envisioned this time!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes! I'm fired up now!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Rina, even if you have to use your board, I bet you'll be able to convey your feelings to the audience just fine!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yes, I'm bursting with emotion. I want to hurry up and sing.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ayumu, you've come a long way since telling your first joke for the "Let's Make Rina Laugh Tournament." It's amazing how quickly you improve once you start something!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I've been looking forward to challenging myself today! Don't take your eyes off me!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey Ai, do you want an extra pair of socks? In case you get cold feet!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: *Laugh* Your puns are the worst. They're great at calming me down though!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Setsuna, after scrutinizing the stage every single day, it's finally time for you to stand on it. I'm so excited! Your arrow of love will pierce everyone's hearts!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: *Giggle* I'm shooting to fill your heart with love, too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Kanata, I heard you scored 100 points on your quiz the other day. What are you going to score onstage today?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Ten thousand points!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Karin, how do you feel in your costume? I bet your allure will make everyone fall head over heels for you!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I won't be held responsible if people hurt themselves swooning at the sight of me!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Emma, the air around you is always so carefree and peaceful. I hope you can fill the entire building with that feeling today.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I'll have to make sure no one nods off, though!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We are Nijigasaki High School Idol Club! Let's go!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shizuku, Setsuna, congrats!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I can't believe you won 8th place at our very first club event! 'Grats, you two!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Seriously! You two were amazing!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, you have completely different ways of showing off your charms, but I was captivated by both of you!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Shizuku, your theater training really paid off. I had no idea you put so much production into your show.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rina-chan Board says, "Moved..."

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Well, I must admit I'm frustrated that I didn't win a prize.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Grrr. Next time, I'll definitely rank high, too! And if anyone dares try to get in my way, then I'll show them—er, just what I can do!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Thank you very much, everyone. Even though the prizes were awarded to the two of us, I think we achieved this victory together.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Agreed. We also owe you our thanks for restarting the club.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What? All I ever do is lock and unlock the door. As for restarting the club, that's really thanks to Kasumi. She's the one who diligently guarded the club room for us!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Kasumi, what did you think of your first performance as a school idol?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Huh? Oh, umm...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I-It was amazing, of course! I've been waiting for this moment for so long!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Your voice just cracked. Are you sick? Do you need a cough drop?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: No. I mean, yes!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: *Laugh*

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hmm.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What are you thinking so hard about?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, sorry. I was reflecting on how everyone did today.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What's your honest opinion?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Don't get me wrong, I was extremely moved by all of your performances! And I loved seeing you on stage for the first time, Ayumu. It's just, everyone seemed kinda nervous.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Well, of course we were.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Something about Kasumi seemed off at the end. Her lifelong wish of performing as a school idol finally came true, so I thought she would be really hyper.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm sure not everyone feels the same way I do, but a solo performance means being onstage all alone, right? It's pretty intimidating, standing alone on a stage that big.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I see. I guess I can't really blame her, then.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I guess in that sense, being in a big group like μ's or Aqours is much more reassuring, because all your friends are right by your side.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah, the joint performance we saw together gave me that impression.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: How do you feel about idol groups, Ayumu?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hmm... I'm not sure. I still don't have very much experience, so it's hard to say.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I didn't think forming a group was necessary, but I never stopped to consider the merits.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (If only the Nijigasaki idols could charm everybody the same way μ's and Aqours did!)
